targets.query: SELECT mean("total") FROM "flexpool_pool_hashrate" WHERE ("coin" = 'xch' AND "coin" =~ /^$coin$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("round_time") FROM "flexpool_pool_average_luck_round_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("luck") *100 FROM "flexpool_pool_blocks" WHERE ("coin" =~ /^$coin$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT 1/mean("result") *100 FROM "flexpool_pool_current_luck" WHERE coin =~ /^$coin$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 1/last("result") *100 FROM "flexpool_pool_current_luck" WHERE coin =~ /^$coin$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.name: coin
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM flexpool_miner_stats WITH KEY = "coin"
